author: cbs8
title: Tracy Bushs New Book A Peace Offering for the Police and the People is a Vivid and Religious Work that Delves Into the Conflict Between Police and the General Public
text:
Recent release “A Peace Offering for the Police and the People” from Bound to Heaven Publishing/Ministries author Tracy Bush is both intriguing and enlightening; this work aims to guide the readers to peace and understanding.
(PRWEB) October 03, 2015
Tracy Bush, a Christian, operator of an outreach ministry, community involvement activist, devoted writer and author, has completed his newest work “A Peace Offering for the Police and the People”: a gripping and potent work that offers insight for change with a new bond of trust, brotherhood and much more.
Published by Bound to Heaven Publishing/Ministries, Tracy Bush’s poignant tale was developed to settle any unrest between the police and the people, bridge any gaps and show how to render a new level of truth.
“It is time to extend a peaceful spirit to reside throughout the USA. This is one of the Lord’s blessings that had to be called into existence by a member of the body of Christ to be followed by the masses of people to keep the peace that is being known by the world as changing times are here. It is time for the country to get in line with the peace movement on this level of thinking and reacting. This book is like a journey to help end a modern day problem, to help with the reformation of the justice system to help the relations between police and people.
If you really want to know of a solution to help with the problem between the police and the people, invest in a possible solution and you will be better off with what may be priceless knowledge that money can’t buy that can help you become more aware. Then who has been chosen to speak for the Lord? Is it you or me or both? It can be an answer to the peace we may be in need of with the problems the police and people are having. It is said by some that it is. But what do you say? Well I guess you will have to read it to know because anyone can say anything but when you know what you know that is good for you and all around you, you want them to know also.” says author Tracy Bush.
Readers who wish to experience this profound work can purchase “A Peace Offering for the Police and the People” at http://www.boundtoheaven.org or online at Amazon.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Page Publishing knows that authors need to be free to create - not bogged down with complicated business issues like eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, insurance, shipping, taxes and the like. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
